title: VP of Analysis
content: As Information Technology research team head, trained and led team to identify undervalued investment opportunities with an emphasis on emerging cloud and enterprise technologies
Developed valuation tool to quickly identify intrinsic value using residual income methodology and alert the user to trading opportunities based on technical analysis
Sponsored and competed in Estimize.com company earnings estimation challenge

title: Treasurer
content: Reconciled three years of non-standardized journal entries constructed by past treasurers to new financial system; had to search for missing documentation and uncovered misappropriation of funds
Developed incentivization proposal to boost waning motivation and ensure support for necessary but unpopular programs
Responsible for organizing and leading Excel workshops with university professors, providing almost 40% of the organizationâ€™s quarter-to-quarter operating revenue

title: VP of Information Technology
content: Built and maintained internal finance system capable of managing a general ledger, accounts payables and receivables, budgeting, and GAAP financial statements using Google Apps script
Created and maintained website, managing not only the front-end but also acquiring a domain and hosting service
Developed scripts to efficiently manage membership status, generate and send newsletters, and schedule events
